description: Otis was willing to do anything with us because he loves trying new things, so we took him rock climbing. “This weekend is full of first times!” We asked Otis what turns him on. “I’m not gonna lie, I kind of turn myself on. And if I was ever going to be gay in any way, it would probably be if I could have the opportunity to fuck myself.” He said confidently. “Would you top or bottom for yourself?” We asked curiously. “I think I would fight myself for that, knowing my personality.” That personality of his got intense. He definitely wasn’t lying about being into himself. Watching him get turned on by his own reflection was such a treat, especially because his dick was still throbbing after blowing a huge load on the mirror!
title: Otis
